Key Arguments: The proposed legislation is seen as a step towards authoritarianism, likened to '1984 on steroids'.
The submission argues for the preservation of free speech, even if it is offensive.
There is a belief that social media platforms already censor speech sufficiently, and additional regulation by ACMA is unnecessary.
Notable Quotes: This is the slow march to communism. 1984 on steroids.
Let free speech be free. If it offends so be it.
